review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick due to online reviews.  But for me, I am compelled to give it a 2 star rating because I could never get it to reliably connect to my wi-fi router.  The user interface seems good, but without being able to connect to program content, I couldn't do a proper evaluation.  It would only connect when I was no more than 10 feet from my router and that is not acceptable.  My Roku boxes all work fine everywhere in my house.
